quest.name: The Least among Us
journal: Who better to serve the Scions of the Seventh Dawn than a humble scholar and his faithful assistant?
Eager to obtain additional readings with which to confirm his theory, your scholarly companion proposes a visit to Urth's Fount. Proceed to the next─and hopefully final─survey site.
Having arrived in Urth's Fount, the scholar bids you do what you have done before: stand watch at an appropriate distance while he takes his measurements.

The survey takes a tragic twist when the scholar discovers the body of Wilred, the young Ala Mhigan whom you personally recruited to the Crystal Braves. Hoary Boulder and Coultenet soon arrive at the scene, and they conclude that the boy was murdered─though by whom and for what reason they can only speculate. The pair offer to look after the scholar in your stead and implore you to report the boy's death to Minfilia at the Rising Stones.

The news of Wilred's death comes as a shock to Minfilia, who cannot fathom why anyone would want to harm the boy. In a hollow voice, she declares that Alphinaud will want to conduct an investigation and send word to Wilred's family, before sinking back into her own thoughts...
objectives: Speak with the unsettled scholar at Urth's Fount.
Stand guard as the scholar takes measurements.
Speak with Minfilia at the Rising Stones.

dialogue.name: SCIENTIST00423
dialogue.text: For our next survey, I would have you escort me to Urth's Fount.

dialogue.name: SCIENTIST00423
dialogue.text: The ambient aether concentrations there are so high that crystalline structures form spontaneously. Consequently, anomalous fluctuations should be much easier to detect. Brilliant, yes? No, don't bother answering─that was rhetorical. Now, come along!

dialogue.name: SCIENTIST00423
dialogue.text: You should be more than familiar with the procedure by now. Pray find a suitable position from which to keep watch while I take measurements.

dialogue.name: SCIENTIST00423
dialogue.text: We will be here all nightmorningday if you do not leave me be, young ladyman!

dialogue.name: SCIENTIST00423
dialogue.text: Yes...yes...quite high, yet still markedly lower than the historical measurements taken near the end of the Sixth Astral Era...

dialogue.name: SCIENTIST00423
dialogue.text: Could the presence of a primal account for the difference? Or is there something else...something else...

dialogue.name: SCIENTIST00423
dialogue.text: Something...else...

dialogue.name: SCIENTIST00423
dialogue.text: Scion! Scion, come here! I-I need you!

dialogue.name: HOARYBOULDER
dialogue.text: Fear not, my friends! Help has arrived!

dialogue.name: COULTENET
dialogue.text: There you are, Forename! Hoary and I were worried when you and your charge failed to return at the appointed hour.

dialogue.name: HOARYBOULDER
dialogue.text: <sigh> Gutted like a hog...but not by one, no. These wounds were made with a blade... Doesn't look like he put up much of a fight, either. Nary a mark on his sword or his shield...

dialogue.name: COULTENET
dialogue.text: I've heard nothing of any Crystal Brave operations in this area. What cause had Wilred to come here?

dialogue.name: SCIENTIST00423
dialogue.text: Wh-What should we do!?

dialogue.name: COULTENET
dialogue.text: We will see to the scholar's protection, Forename.

dialogue.name: HOARYBOULDER
dialogue.text: Aye, and the boy's remains. You should return to the Rising Stones. The Antecedent will want to know what happened here.

dialogue.name: HOARYBOULDER
dialogue.text: And so do I...

dialogue.name: SCIENTIST00423
dialogue.text: I've...I've never been this close to a...to a... Oh...oh gods...

dialogue.name: HOARYBOULDER
dialogue.text: We spoke a few times in the Rising Stones. He wasn't as experienced as some of the other Braves─but gods, he had passion...

dialogue.name: COULTENET
dialogue.text: Gods, what a waste... Pray leave matters here to us, Forename. You must return to the Rising Stones and inform the Antecedent at once.

dialogue.name: MINFILIA
dialogue.text: Forename, you are returned! And you seem troubled. Did the role of escort chafe so?

dialogue.name: MINFILIA
dialogue.text: Wilred...dead? Mayhap murdered? By the Twelve! How can that be!?

dialogue.name: MINFILIA
dialogue.text: I will send word to Alphinaud at once. He will want to conduct a full investigation, and send word to Wilred's family...

dialogue.name: MINFILIA
dialogue.text: Gods... He was just a boy. Who would do this─and why?

dialogue.name: MINFILIA
dialogue.text: Gods... He was just a boy. Who would do this─and why? ...But I am sorry, Forename. Doubtless this weighs heavy on your heart...and we have already imposed upon you so much.

dialogue.name: MINFILIA
dialogue.text: Pray take some time for yourself─I daresay you have more than earned a respite. After all, we will be most busy with preparations as the banquet draws near. Should other adventures summon you elsewhere, perhaps now is the time to heed their call?

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: In order to progress in the main scenario, you must first complete certain quests in the Crystal Tower series.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: The Crystal Tower quest series may be undertaken by speaking with the outlandish man in Revenant's Toll.
